video.title: Total Drama
video.synopsis: Heartwarming moments are interspersed with backstabbing, scheming, sabotage and broken alliances in this animated spoof of reality show competitions.

episodes.synopsis: The campers arrive and learn that instead of chilling in a gorgeous mansion, they'll be spending the next eight weeks at dingy old Camp Wawanakwa.
episodes.title: The Not So Great Outdoors: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The campers must jump off a high cliff into shark-infested waters, then carry a cartload of materials back to the campgrounds and build a hot tub.
episodes.title: The Not So Great Outdoors: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The campers face off in an epic "awake-a-thon." Eva's raging temper causes the biggest drama when her Mp3 player is "stolen" and she freaks out.
episodes.title: The Big Sleep

episodes.synopsis: The campers face off in a game of dodgeball. After losing two challenges in a row, The Killer Bass are the underdogs and do not expect to win.
episodes.title: DodgeBrawl

episodes.synopsis: In the most dramatic elimination competition yet, Chef Hatchet votes on which team has the most talent and which must send a player to the Loser Boat.
episodes.title: Not Quite Famous

episodes.synopsis: During an overnight camping trip into the woods, Izzy dons a bear costume to play a joke on her teammates but ends up attracting a real grizzly.
episodes.title: The Sucky Outdoors

episodes.synopsis: Each camper is forced to face his or her worst fear. Beth surprises all when she turns out to be one fearless cookie, and Gwen and Trent bond.
episodes.title: Phobia Factor

episodes.synopsis: The campers participate in a three-part canoe race to scary Boney Island. A sliver in Geoff's finger sends the Bass into crisis mode.
episodes.title: Up the Creek

episodes.synopsis: The campers are split up into Deer and Hunters, and each team has to go out and bag as many of the other team's deer as possible.
episodes.title: Paintball Deer Hunter

episodes.synopsis: The teams must make a three-course meal for judgment. The love you/hate you thing heats up between Duncan and Courtney. Geoff and Beth grow closer.
episodes.title: If You Can't Take the Heat...

episodes.synopsis: Campers take on three trust challenges: extreme rock climbing, preparing their partner a blowfish dinner and scaling an obstacle course blindfolded.
episodes.title: Who Can You Trust?

episodes.synopsis: The campers are sent to an insane boot camp, Chef Hatchet style. The only rule -- they go until everyone drops out and one camper is left standing.
episodes.title: Basic Straining

episodes.synopsis: The campers are challenged to participate in an X-treme Sports Challenge that includes Sofa Bed Skydiving and Mechanical Moose Rodeo Riding.
episodes.title: X-Treme Torture

episodes.synopsis: The campers' challenge this week is to eat a nine-course meal of disgusting stuff. And Chris pits the guys against the girls in a Battle of the Sexes.
episodes.title: Bunch of Disgustingness

episodes.synopsis: The teams are dissolved, and it's every camper for himself. Contestants must answer Camp Wawanakwa trivia questions or spin the Wheel of Misfortune.
episodes.title: No Pain, No Game

episodes.synopsis: The camp scallywags set out on ye olde "Scavenger Hunt for Treasure" challenge -- only they're actually hunting for the keys to the treasure chests.
episodes.title: Search and Do Not Destroy

episodes.synopsis: The campers play hide-and-seek with ruthless Chef Hatchet as their seeker, combining his guerilla tactics, super soaker and hate-on for the campers.
episodes.title: Hide and Be Sneaky

episodes.synopsis: The campers must not only race on a treacherous motor cross course but also build their own bicycles using supplies from the Arts & Crafts Lodge.
episodes.title: That's Off the Chain!

episodes.synopsis: The campers watch a horror movie about an escaped chainsaw psycho killer who lives in the woods. And one by one, our campers start to disappear.
episodes.title: Hook, Line and Screamer

episodes.synopsis: The campers are challenged to become Game Wardens and bag a beast in eight hours, armed with only nets, buckets, paper towels and a tranquilizer gun.
episodes.title: Wawanakwa Gone Wild!

episodes.synopsis: The teams are handcuffed together in a twisted version of a triathlon that includes force-feeding each other and creating a Totem Pole of Shame.
episodes.title: Trial by Tri-Armed Triathalon

episodes.synopsis: This episode offers a recap of the "Total Drama Island" season, as well as a look at the losers.
episodes.title: Haute Camp-ture

episodes.synopsis: A torrential rainstorm washes away the cabins, and Duncan, Gwen and Heather wake up in the middle of Lake Leech with no idea where they are.
episodes.title: Camp Castaways

episodes.synopsis: The campers wake up in the middle of the wilderness, and Sergeant Chef assigns a grueling mission: find base camp with only the sparsest of supplies.
episodes.title: Are We There, Yeti?!

episodes.synopsis: In the semi-final round, Heather, Gwen and Owen must play a game of I Triple Dog Dare You, a twisted version of "spin the bottle meets truth or dare."
episodes.title: Triple Dog Dare You

episodes.synopsis: It's the finals, and there's a surprise in store for reigning champs Owen and Gwen: All their former teammates are back for the last challenge.
episodes.title: The Very Last Episode, Really!

episodes.synopsis: At the wrap party, Chris announces that the cash prize has been yanked out the winner's hands and is up for grabs again -- only now it's $1 million!
episodes.title: Total Drama, Drama, Drama, Drama Island

episodes.synopsis: Fourteen of our Season 1 competitors are dumped at the gates of a dilapidated studio film lot where they'll be spending the next six weeks.
episodes.title: Monster Cash!

episodes.synopsis: Fourteen cast mates embark on an epic search for alien eggs in our alien movie-themed challenge, while Chef, aka Mama Alien, tracks their every move.
episodes.title: Alien Resurr-eggtion

episodes.synopsis: After winning last week's challenge, Gwen and Trent find themselves with a "reward": They're forced to pick teams and compete against each other.
episodes.title: Riot On Set

episodes.synopsis: Trent and Gwen have made up after last week's challenge, at least initially, as the teams learn that this week's movie genre is the Teen Beach Flick.
episodes.title: Beach Blanket Bogus

episodes.synopsis: During an epic heat wave, the contestants are thrust into a Western movie-themed challenge, complete with calf roping, against their will.
episodes.title: 3:10 to Crazytown

episodes.synopsis: Geoff and Bridgette, our first two cast members ousted from this season's competition, welcome us to the Total Drama Action Aftermath show.
episodes.title: The Aftermath: Trent's Descent

episodes.synopsis: A rude awakening finds all the guys and girls locked in their trailers as prep for today's "Prison Movie Showdown."
episodes.title: The Chefshank Redemption

episodes.synopsis: The "campers" are thrown into med school and forced to cram all night for the medical drama challenge to follow.
episodes.title: One Flu Over The Cuckoos

episodes.synopsis: When Chris dramatically drops in on the cast, complete with fake blood spatters, everyone realizes that it's time for the horror movie challenge.
episodes.title: The Sand Witch Project

episodes.synopsis: The cast misses DJ's delicious cooking as they are tempted to lose their disgusting lunch on this week's disaster movie-themed challenges.
episodes.title: Masters of Disasters

episodes.synopsis: The Screaming Gaffers are falling apart at the seams, so when a war movie challenge is announced, they're not the most cohesive platoon in the world.
episodes.title: Full Metal Drama

episodes.synopsis: Geoff and Bridgette's aftermath show features ousted competitors from Season 1, viewer webcam segments, as well as two special guests: DJ and Gwen.
episodes.title: The Aftermath: For-Gwen and Forget?

episodes.synopsis: This week's bank heist challenge starts with the teams having to blow a safe and rescue either Owen or Leshawna from within.
episodes.title: Ocean's Eight - Or Nine

episodes.synopsis: Dig up the hatchets, everyone, because Courtney is back! Unfortunately for Courtney, it's caveman movie week, which means fur loincloths for everyone.
episodes.title: One Million Bucks B.C

episodes.synopsis: It's sports movie day on Total Drama Action. Every sports cliché in the book gets a good workout, along with the eight remaining cast members.
episodes.title: Million Dollar Babies

episodes.synopsis: The seven remaining cast mates embark on this week's spy-movie themed challenge as the teams are merged. It's every girl and boy for themselves.
episodes.title: Dial M for Merger

episodes.synopsis: Chris swings in on a rope and announces that today is a day to be brave: Total Drama Action is paying homage to the superhero flick.
episodes.title: Super Hero-ld

episodes.synopsis: Geoff and Bridgette welcome us to another spectacularly juicy, behind-the-scenes episode of the Total Drama Action Aftermath show. Gossip lives here!
episodes.title: The Aftermath: O-wen or Lose

episodes.synopsis: When Chris shows up with a glass combat boot, the contestants know it's time to bust open the conventions of a fairy tale movie.
episodes.title: The Princess Pride

episodes.synopsis: And then there were five. ... The gloves are off and the magnifying glasses are out, as Chris declares this week the mystery movie challenge.
episodes.title: Get A Clue

episodes.synopsis: Strap on those air guitars! This is the week to rock 'n' roll! But first, the five remaining cast members learn they are soon to be six.
episodes.title: Rock `n Rule

episodes.synopsis: It's the girls vs. the boys as Chris declares this episode's kung fu challenge. Our host decrees Owen to be banished from today's competition.
episodes.title: Crouching Courtney, Hidden Owen

episodes.synopsis: The five remaining cast mates embark on a challenge that's out of this world in this week's outer space extravaganza.
episodes.title: 2008: A Space Owen

episodes.synopsis: Four remaining cast mates embark on this week's animal-buddy flick, forced to bond with creatures of the fur and feather variety.
episodes.title: Top Dog

episodes.synopsis: A pirate-themed challenge finds Beth and Duncan racing through a series of shipboard obstacles before being launched out of a canon.
episodes.title: Mutiny on the Soundstage

episodes.synopsis: Beth and Duncan sit through an aftermath show that includes grilling from their cast-off teammates about some of the questionable choices they made.
episodes.title: The Aftermath: Pt. Four

episodes.synopsis: In Season 2, the drama has shifted to an abandoned film studio back lot, where contestants will face new challenges -- all inspired by the movies.
episodes.title: Celebrity Manhunt's Total Drama Action Reunion Show

episodes.synopsis: The third season has begun, as the 17 contestants are introduced to their new home and transportation method for the competition.
episodes.title: Walk Like An Egyptian- Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The three teams, using their various rewards, must race across the desert to the Nile River. There, they must weave baskets to cross the deadly river.
episodes.title: Walk Like An Egyptian- Part 2

episodes.synopsis: The remaining contestants travel to Japan for a dangerous challenge: The teams must survive a Japanese game show and then shoot a commercial.
episodes.title: Super Happy Crazy Fun Time Japan

episodes.synopsis: The three teams fly to the Yukon in Canada and undertake a number of challenges in the freezing temperatures.
episodes.title: Anything Yukon Do, I Can Do Better

episodes.synopsis: The three teams head east to the Big Apple. One contestant's knowledge about the host of the show leads to someone else's plan.
episodes.title: Broadway, Baby!

episodes.synopsis: The first aftermath of the season has premiered, with an old host and a new one. The other six non-contestants watch alongside as the peanut gallery.
episodes.title: Aftermath: Bridgette Over Troubled Water

episodes.synopsis: Chris takes the remaining 13 campers to the snowy German Alps, where their next challenge awaits.
episodes.title: Slap Slap Revolution

episodes.synopsis: The three teams are taken to the Amazon, where their 18-hour challenge awaits. One team ends up in deep trouble due to a teammate's misjudgment.
episodes.title: The Am-AH-Zon Race

episodes.synopsis: The contestants arrive in Paris, and everything but love is in the air for these teens. The three teams struggle to complete their challenge.
episodes.title: Can't Help Falling in Louvre

episodes.synopsis: The host's hometown is visited as the 11 teens compete in their next challenge. One team is down to its last member.
episodes.title: Newf Kids on the Rock

episodes.synopsis: After the plane runs out of gas, the final 11 are stranded in Jamaica. One person is starting to have second thoughts about his or her romance.
episodes.title: Jamaica Me Sweat

episodes.synopsis: The second installment of the tour aftermath includes a fundraiser to pay for the plane's fuel. The four eliminated contestants are interviewed.
episodes.title: Aftermath: Revenge of the Telethon

episodes.synopsis: With only two teams remaining, the host takes the contestants to London, where their challenge is to capture a criminal before he catches them.
episodes.title: I See London¿

episodes.synopsis: The final nine travel to Greece to compete in various Olympics challenges. Two contestants are nervous about their kiss.
episodes.title: Greece's Pieces

episodes.synopsis: The two teams must search Area 51 for intact alien artifacts and bring them back to the Total Drama jumbo jet.
episodes.title: The EX-Files

episodes.synopsis: The remaining eight contestants travel to Australia, where tension flares. Two people's strategy to weaken an opponent proves to work well.
episodes.title: Picnic at Hanging Dork

episodes.synopsis: The two teams land in Sweden to compete in a "Viking" capture-the-flag game. Someone tries to flirt with an opponent.
episodes.title: Sweden Sour

episodes.synopsis: After one co-host forces another into doing a world tour of Total Drama fan countries, the third host becomes fed up.
episodes.title: Aftermath Aftermayhem

episodes.synopsis: The remaining seven are dumped in Niagara Falls for their next challenge, where it is revealed that one person is debuting onto the show.
episodes.title: Niagara Brawls

episodes.synopsis: The final seven go to China for a visit to the Great Wall. Tension continues between four contestants.
episodes.title: Chinese Fake-Out

episodes.synopsis: The final five arrive in Tanzania for their next challenge: hunting down a former contestant who has now gone feral after hiding in the cargo hold.
episodes.title: African Lying Safari

episodes.synopsis: The final four contestants are on their way to Easter Island to compete in an egg-hunt-themed challenge.
episodes.title: Rapa Phooey!

episodes.synopsis: The final four head to Alberta, Canada, to participate in an archaeology-themed challenge. One contestant frames another to anger someone else.
episodes.title: Awwwwww, Drumheller

episodes.synopsis: The Total Drama aftermath show reveals the location of the finale: Hawaii. The four most recently eliminated contestants are brought out.
episodes.title: Hawaiian Style

episodes.synopsis: With their original mode of transportation destroyed, the three remaining contestants must engage in a full-out, no-rules race to Hawaii.
episodes.title: Planes, Trains, and Hot Air Mobiles

episodes.synopsis: Total Drama World Tour has reached its final episode, and the host announces the final challenge, which involves one of Hawaii's active volcanoes.
episodes.title: Hawaiian Punch

seasons.title: Total Drama Revenge of the Island

episodes.synopsis: A whole new cast arrives at Camp Wawanakwa, which has turned into a waste dump. After splitting into teams, one contestant emerges as most annoying.
episodes.title: Bigger! Badder! Brutal-er!

episodes.synopsis: A tell-all game ends up embarrassing several contestants. Due to the problems in round one, the host makes the second round miserable for both teams.
episodes.title: Truth or Laser Shark

episodes.synopsis: One of the Maggots asserts herself as team leader, while a Rat continues to ruin his team's chances regardless of others' abilities.
episodes.title: Ice Ice Baby

episodes.synopsis: The two teams are sent into the the woods on a scavenger hunt, where one camper's alternate personality hooks up another camper.
episodes.title: Finders Creepers

episodes.synopsis: As one team deals with their newest member, the other is severely divided by one contestant, who shares feelings for two girls at once.
episodes.title: Backstabbers Ahoy!

episodes.synopsis: One contestant is feeling inadequate in the machismo department, while a member of the opposing team is showing a little too much of it.
episodes.title: Runaway Model

episodes.synopsis: The two teams are sent into an abandoned mine, where one camper takes charge, and another throws the challenge to save his old team.
episodes.title: A Mine Is a Terrible Thing to Waste

episodes.synopsis: The teams wake up in the middle of the lake, where a returnee starts mutating due to toxic exposure and seeks help from a fellow teammate.
episodes.title: The Treasure Island of Dr. McLean

episodes.synopsis: The teams are merged, and the host sends the players on a challenge. Due to one person's slip-up, someone with a secret is forced under another.
episodes.title: Grand Chef Auto

episodes.synopsis: It's down to the final five, and when the host places the campers in an aerial-based challenge, three dangerous threats attempt to outfox each other.
episodes.title: Up, Up and Away in My Pitiful Balloon

episodes.synopsis: The final four take on a gross cooking challenge. Two contestants align to rid of their enemy, while their enemy tries to eliminate a physical threat.
episodes.title: Eat, Puke and Be Wary

episodes.synopsis: The final three face off in a forest full of toxic carnivorous plants. An alliance between two contestants is severely strained by the challenge.
episodes.title: The Enchanted Franken-Forest

episodes.synopsis: After a long, hard and painful season, only two contestants remain to battle it out in a coliseum for the million-dollar prize.
episodes.title: Brain vs. Brawn: The Ultimate Showdown

episodes.synopsis: Host Chris McLean introduces a new All-Star season, with seven "Heroic Hamsters" and seven "Villainous Vultures" competing for a big prize.
episodes.title: Heroes vs. Villains

episodes.synopsis: The contestants are brought to the beach for a 3-D puzzle challenge, but the Villains can't work together and the Heroes are too hapless to keep up.
episodes.title: Evil Dread

episodes.synopsis: The contestants are forced to tap into their primal instincts when they are sent into the forest for an unusual paintball-like challenge.
episodes.title: Saving Private Leechball

episodes.synopsis: The contestants endure a challenge that combines eating pancakes with negotiating an obstacle course; Scott and Courtney develop a relationship.
episodes.title: Food Fright

episodes.synopsis: The teams must race to the other side of the island on a night during which the harvest moon turns the local wildlife into crazed predators.
episodes.title: Moon Madness

episodes.synopsis: Chris sends the teams to Boney Island to hunt for eggs inside an area he refers to as the "Fun Zone," which is nothing like it sounds.
episodes.title: No One Eggspects the Spanish Opposition

episodes.synopsis: Chris pits the contestants against one another in the ultimate head-to-head challenge: a boxing bout that forces the players to confront their fears.
episodes.title: Suckers Punched

episodes.synopsis: As the two teams merge into one group, the players are sent on a bizarre boat race around the island in their first individual showdown.
episodes.title: You Regatta Be Kidding Me

episodes.synopsis: Chris's attempts to celebrate the 100th episode of the show are thwarted when he's kidnapped and the All-Stars have to search for their host.
episodes.title: Zeek and Ye Shall Find

episodes.synopsis: The final six players endure an awful boot camp and the harshest obstacle course ever, while alliances start to break down.
episodes.title: The Obsta-kill Kourse

episodes.synopsis: Chris forces the final five to race to the most dangerous parts of the island to retrieve ingredients for making delicious ice cream sundaes.
episodes.title: Sundae Muddy Sundae

episodes.synopsis: Mike's alter ego throws a wrench into the final four challenge, which has the contestants searching the island for hidden treasure.
episodes.title: The Bold and the Booty-ful

episodes.synopsis: The final two contestants go head-to-head in a dangerous challenge called Circles of Doom, with some help from the previously eliminated players.
episodes.title: The Final Wreck-ening

episodes.synopsis: With zero amenities, this season's island home is the toughest yet as 16 raw recruits are introduced in a "build your own accommodations" challenge.
episodes.title: So, Uh This Is My Team?

episodes.synopsis: The latest challenge involves grabbing a greased pig. And with contestants squabbling and romantic feelings coming out, it's anything but "boaring."
episodes.title: I Love You, Grease Pig!

episodes.synopsis: A water balloon challenge bursts a few bubbles, Samey and Amy are in a death match for twin superiority ... and a poison apple comes back into play.
episodes.title: Twinning Isn't Everything

episodes.synopsis: "Truth or dare" becomes "truth or scare" for the teams, and the losers are going to be in for some shocks. Samey shares a secret with the audience.
episodes.title: I Love You, I Love You Knots

episodes.synopsis: The challenges go over the top with Shawn's zombie sighting, and everyone's on edge when a past contestant appears with a challenge of his own.
episodes.title: A Blast from the Past

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's monkeying around looking for a golden coin for the vending machine. Dave tries to prove himself to Sky, and Max jeopardizes his team.
episodes.title: Mo' Monkey, Mo' Problems

episodes.synopsis: The contestants are up for crossing a big, scary cave until Chris throws a game-changer and a possible Dave-Sky alliance puts everyone in the dumps.
episodes.title: This Is The Pits!

episodes.synopsis: The contestants are stuck with baby steps when each team is given a crying infant to carry on their challenge to cross three different danger zones.
episodes.title: Three Zones and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: A hide-and-seek challenge is way too easy -- until Chris reveals that Sugar is going to be "It." Weepy Dave still has a problem accepting rejection.
episodes.title: Hurl and Go Seek!

episodes.synopsis: Contestants are ready to explode while the island threatens to blow up. Chris' latest challenge is to save them all, but he has a little confession.
episodes.title: Scarlett Fever

episodes.synopsis: In the race to the top of a mountain challenge, two archenemies form one alliance, while two other contestants make a deal that's bound to be broken.
episodes.title: Break Back Mountain

episodes.synopsis: The final three contestants must each devise a challenge, no holds barred. The two physical tests aren't so bad, but the third is a real showstopper.
episodes.title: Pahk'd with Talent

episodes.synopsis: In the season finale, the two remaining contestants face dissing from Chris, hindrances from helpers and one last twist that might change everything.
episodes.title: Lies, Cries and One Big Prize
